text:
The allure of hiking up Mount Batur, an active
volcano, had us out of bed at 2 AM to reach
We made it to the top.

The physically demanding hike was totally
worth it the moment we witnessed an unforgettable

Our attention quickly shifted to the cheeky
monkeys begging for food, playing and wandering

around the area where all of the hikers were
clustered.

It is not everyday that you get to climb an
active volcano.
It was totally worth the long climb up.

Before we made our way back down we spent
time enjoying the scenery and taking plenty

If you're planning on trekking ensure that
you wear proper footwear to counter the sharp

There are plenty of loose rocks and shale
and we almost slipped a few times.

Overall, we'd recommend the hike for those
who are physically fit and adventurous.
